I recommend visiting Mount Everest base campğŸ• Traveling there could be expensive but the high cost of traveling there is offset by the lower entrance fees. My friend who’s just been there showed me his photos taken there by which I was awestruck. The outline of the Himalayas is sharply defined against the starry nights by which you’ll be awestruck. The nearby lakes reflects the beauty of the stars âœ¨ and the Himalaya giving a double view of the starry sky and the mountains. A tour of Mount Everest would be a once in a lifetime experience. If you’re going on holiday in Tibet, why not visit the base camp â›ºï¸ as well? Though it can be pricy, cheaper entrance fee offsets the rising transportation fees.
